name: Flower Secret - Hexagon Block Puzzle
description:
Flower Secret is easy to learn and fun to master. It’s an addictive hex puzzle game with 100+ interesting level designs for all ages!

The rule is very simple. Drag the hex block to fill the board. Once complete a line in either direction, the line’s blocks will eliminate. More blocks you eliminate, more scores you get. Classic Endless mode and fun Story mode for you to choose.

Key Features: 
- Various block shapes and colorful graphic design
- 100+ levels in Story Mode
- No time limit for Endless mode
- Daily check in reward and extra bonus designs
- Creative elements like pearl shark, cage animals, spinning bombs
- Keys, Magic wand, Energy potion, Hammer, lots of props
- Play together with your friends and challenge the best score!
